did.abstract: Thomas Moran was the Safety Director for the Utility Workers Union of America, Local 1-2. This collection contains materials related to Local 1-2.

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Thomas Moran was the Safety Director for the Utility Workers Union of America, Local 1-2, and in this position worked with the White Lung Association, the New York Committee for Occupational Safety and Health to advocate for the removal of asbestos all over New York City.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection has not been arranged by an archivist; materials are in the order in which they were received from the donor.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) held by Thomas Moran were transferred to New York University in 2000 by Thomas Moran. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured from Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Archives. Please contact tamiment.wagner@nyu.edu, (212) 998-2630.
